measured_by: Mushroom-foraging one-armed bandit task (finite horizon approach-avoid decision game)
justification: "Participants sequentially encountered patches of mushrooms that contained 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, or 32 exemplars ... and chose to either eat it ... or avoid it ... This simple scenario mimics the formal analysis described above," providing the behavioral data used to quantify their exploratory choices.

measured_by: Mushroom-foraging contextual one-armed bandit task (infinite horizon, prospect-frequency version)
justification: "Participants played a mushroom-foraging game that instantiated the kind of contextual one-armed bandit problem described above ... to test whether participants display a sensitivity to prospect frequency," allowing measurement of forward-looking exploration when the number of future encounters was unknown.
